sentence.Network_en: He is back in more congenial company.
sentence.Network_cn: 他回来后变得更容易相处了。

sentence.Network_en: I met few people congenial to me in the department.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那个单位里我没碰到几个意气相投的人.

entry.def: A congenial person, place, or environment is pleasant.

example.ex: He is back in more congenial company.
example.tran: 他回来后变得更容易相处了。

means.word_mean: 1. suitable to your needs or similar to your nature;

sentences.sentence: "two congenial spirits united...by mutual confidence and reciprocal virtues"- T.L.Peacock

means.word_mean: 2. used of plants; capable of cross-fertilization or of being grafted

auth_sentence.content: Breyer said, It's a congenial and professional Court.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Breyer said, It's a congenial and professional Court.

auth_sentence.content: Not that the relationship is always congenial.
auth_sentence.res_content: Not that the relationship is always congenial.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Not that the relationship is always congenial.

auth_sentence.content: The mood was congenial, in a weary kind of way.
auth_sentence.res_content: The mood was congenial, in a weary kind of way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The mood was congenial, in a weary kind of way.

stems_affixes.type_exp: =of,relating to,characterized by…… 表形容词,"关于……的,有……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bene好+fic做+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.[to]有利的,有益的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 商业的;商务的;可获利的
stems_affixes.word_buile: commerce商业+ial关于……的,有……的→商业的;商务的
con共同+gen产生+ial关于……的,有……的→产生共同[兴趣]→情投意合的
consequent作为结果的,随之发生的+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.产生后果的,重要的
con共同+viv生命+ial关于……的,有……的→共同活跃的→欢乐的
different不同的+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.差别的 n.差别,差异;微分
influent流入的+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.有影响的,有势力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 司法的,法庭的,审判的;明断的,公正的
stems_affixes.word_buile: judic审理+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.司法的,法庭的,审判的;明断的,公正的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 偏狭的,粗俗的;地方性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: province省+ial关于……的,有……的→地方性的

commerce商业+ial关于……的,有……的→商业的;商务的
different不同的+ial关于……的,有……的→adj.差别的 n.差别,差异;微分

means.word_mean: 宜人的, 适宜的;意气相投的

sentences.cn: 我发现他跟人很合得来。
